name: The Beginning
description: You made it! It was a rough ride but you are alive. Where is everone? Where is all your supplies? It's so dark! What is that?!

quests.name: Time to eat
quests.description: Getting a basic setup is hard work and you have worked up an apatite. You need to start thinking about growing some crops to have a renewable food source.

quests.name: Benchmarking
quests.description: Having a place to work and craft is a necessity. Build yourself a crafting table or station so you can craft more complex recipes.

quests.name: Back to basics
quests.description: You need some supplies so that surviving the night is possible. There are strange creatures all around that don't seem very friendly. A shelter is very much needed.

tasks.longDescription: Gather some wood, any kind will do. You need as much as you can get to build a safe house.

quests.name: Basic tools
quests.description: Now that you have a simple, somewhat safe structure built you need to start thinking about gathering more resources to make your new home a little more safe. But using your fists just doesn't do it anymore, and its starting to hurt.

tasks.longDescription: Craft a basic set of tools that can speed up the process a little in gathering more resources.
